snippet.title: Stream Raiders | Join Your Streamer In Battle! - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Stream Raiders is a community-based battle game that lets streamers play with their viewers alongside their main content—live on Twitch! 

The streamer is the “Captain” and their viewers make up the army. Progress through campaign maps together to collect rewards, unlock new units, and level-up your army!

Our Open Beta is Live 10/07/20! 

Join the battle at https://www.streamraiders.com/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/StreamRaiders
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/SJF2Eef  

Directed & Animated By Grant Kolton: grantkolton.com (IG: @grantkoltoons)
